name: World Trees
description: Mythical trees of enormous size that are said to connect different realms or planes of existence. The magical nature can provide access to other planes or powerful magical properties, while the connection to multiple realms creates unique opportunities and dangers.
atmosphere: Mythical trees of impossible size connect multiple planes of existence while their branches extend into other dimensions. Magical energy flows through the trunk as interdimensional phenomena occur among the leaves. Cosmic axis around which multiple realities revolve.
